vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.32
§ Hoshaiah = "Jehovah as saved"
1) a prince of Judah who assisted in the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
2) the father of Jezaniah (or Azariah) who was a man of note after the destruction of Jerusalem by Nebuchadnezzar in the time of Jeremiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hombre; post exílico; (b)   padre de Azarías, oficial del ejército de Judá, en tiempos del exilio
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
何沙雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華已經拯救"
1) 猶大的王子, 曾助尼希米行獻耶路撒冷城牆之禮 ( #尼 12:13| )
2) 耶撒尼亞(又名亞撒利雅)的父親, 他是耶利米時代, 尼布甲尼撒王毀滅耶路撒冷城
之後的首領之一 ( #耶 42:1| )
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
何沙雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华已经拯救"
1) 犹大的王子, 曾助尼希米行献耶路撒冷城墙之礼 ( #尼 12:13| )
2) 耶撒尼亚(又名亚撒利雅)的父亲, 他是耶利米时代, 尼布甲尼撒王毁灭耶路撒冷城
之后的首领之一 ( #耶 42:1| )

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Jer.42.1;
father of: Jezaniah (H3153)
§ Hoshaiah = "Jehovah as saved"
1) a prince of Judah who assisted in the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
2) the father of Jezaniah (or Azariah) who was a man of note after the destruction of Jerusalem by Nebuchadnezzar in the time of Jeremiah
